sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This action creates a candidate profile for background check.

Inputs:

  • First Name - First name of the candidate to be created.
  • Last Name - Last name of the candidate to be created.
  • Middle Name - Middle name of the candidate to be created.
  • Maiden Name - Maiden name of the candidate to be created.
  • Suffix - Suffix of the candidate to be created.
  • Salutation - Salutation of the candidate to be created.
  • Email - Email of the candidate.
  • Phones - Candidate phone details.
    • Number - Specifies 10-digit phone number.
    • Extension - Extension of number.
    • Country Code - Specifies country code.
    • Type - Specifies the type of phone number. Default is primary.
  • Addresses - Candidate address details.
    • City - The city or area of the given address.
    • State - The state or region of the candidate.
    • Country – The country of residence of the address.
    • Street Address – The residence address of the candidate.
    • Zip Code – The zip or postal code of the address.

Outputs:

  • Candidate ID - ID of the candidate created.
  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

Error Messages:

  • Provided First Name is invalid or not found.
  • Provided Last Name is invalid or not found.
  • Provided Middle Name is invalid or not found.
  • Provided Maiden Name is invalid or not found.
  • Provided Suffix is invalid or not found.
  • Provided Salutation is invalid or not found.
  • Provided Email is invalid or not found.
  • Provided Phone number is invalid or not found.
  • Invalid username or password/token or the token has expired.
  • The user does not have sufficient permission to perform this action.

To use this action, the corresponding First Advantage connection and credential must be created and associated with the First Advantage Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
This action creates a candidate profile for background check.

Inputs:

  • First Name - First name of the candidate to be created.
  • Last Name - Last name of the candidate to be created.
  • Middle Name - Middle name of the candidate to be created.
  • Maiden Name - Maiden name of the candidate to be created.
  • Suffix - Suffix of the candidate to be created.
  • Salutation - Salutation of the candidate to be created.
  • Email - Email of the candidate.
  • Phones - Candidate phone details.
    • Number - Specifies 10-digit phone number.
    • Extension - Extension of number.
    • Country Code - Specifies country code.
    • Type - Specifies the type of phone number. Default is primary.
  • Addresses - Candidate address details.
    • City - The city or area of the given address.
    • State - The state or region of the candidate.
    • Country – The country of residence of the address.
    • Street Address – The residence address of the candidate.
    • Zip Code – The zip or postal code of the address.

Outputs:

  • Candidate ID - ID of the candidate created.
  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

Error Messages:

  • Provided First Name is invalid or not found.
  • Provided Last Name is invalid or not found.
  • Provided Middle Name is invalid or not found.
  • Provided Maiden Name is invalid or not found.
  • Provided Suffix is invalid or not found.
  • Provided Salutation is invalid or not found.
  • Provided Email is invalid or not found.
  • Provided Phone number is invalid or not found.
  • Invalid username or password/token or the token has expired.
  • The user does not have sufficient permission to perform this action.

To use this action, the corresponding First Advantage connection and credential must be created and associated with the First Advantage Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
